meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of wood.
meanings.sent1: The wooden table was woodier than the plastic one.
meanings.sent2: The forest floor felt woodier under my feet.
meanings.sent3: The woodier chair in the room creaked loudly when sat on.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a woodier tone after spending hours in the log cabin.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pine made the room feel even woodier.

meanings.sent1: The artist painted a woodier texture on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The old ship had a woodier appearance after years at sea.
meanings.sent3: The woodier door handle felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him as woodier as an oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The woodier fence blended seamlessly with the trees.
